Articles.Content: Well, I wanted to make a Spore account (I just got galactic adventures and found it necessary to make an account to download adventures and stuff to keep my sporepedia stocked up) And www.Spore.com doesnt work! Can anyone please tell me what is going on?

Well, I wanted to make a Spore account (I just got galactic adventures and found it necessary to make an account to download adventures and stuff to keep my sporepedia stocked up) And www.Spore.com doesnt work! Can anyone please tell me what is going on?

I feel like I should post the typical "uggh, not somebody else who needs this question answered" response, but this isn't the Sporum (It's been asked there a lot).

The answer is that Spore.com is being moved to a new server, and is undergoing a very long maintenance period.

I feel like I should post the typical "uggh, not somebody else who needs this question answered" response, but this isn't the Sporum (It's been asked there a lot).

The answer is that Spore.com is being moved to a new server, and is undergoing a very long maintenance period.

Oh! Ok, i was wondering about that myself! Will reinstall spore after it's up. Need to find my account again anyway.

I feel like I should post the typical "uggh, not somebody else who needs this question answered" response, but this isn't the Sporum (It's been asked there a lot).

The answer is that Spore.com is being moved to a new server, and is undergoing a very long maintenance period.

Soooooo is there an ETA?

Soooooo is there an ETA?

No ETA at the moment. For all who are interested, go to this link: http://forum.spore.com/jforum/posts/list/83747.page

I've been following the maintenance as well.
Wait... wasn't Spore dead for a while now? I didn't know people still played it, I've heard a lot about it being dead.

Wait... wasn't Spore dead for a while now? I didn't know people still played it, I've heard a lot about it being dead.

Spore is far from dead...

Spore is far from dead...

Such an amazing game shall never die. This game is all my childhood ! It is awesome in so many ways. Can't think of many flaws (ofc a few, but insignificant... )

Spore is far from dead...

Well, far is an overstatement. Let's say it's on life support.

Obligatory "It could have been much better than it was" statement.
Say, i wonder if any of you guys have encountered a,y of my creations? I know . One of my stupid creations was just called anemic, balemic dog (no joke)
Well that's why I keep on seeing it pop up.
They should make a Spore 2 targeted at teens and older players. You know, like the original Spore was supposed to be ;P
